description: Complete demolition of four (4) existing single-family houses. Including hazardous materials abatement and the removal and disconnection of all related services located on lot 22, 24, 25 and 26 on Nikku Lane in Iqaluit, Nunavut.

full_summary:
### Tender Announcement: Demolition Services
#### Government of Canada
#### Notice Type: Request for Proposal

#### Issuing Agency: 
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

#### Objective:

The Governments of Canada invites qualified contractors to submit proposals for the Demolition of Existing Buildings (Reference Number: WS4499910042) in Iqaluit, Nunavut. The work comprises the complete demolition of four existing single-family houses, including hazardous materials abatement and the removal and disconnection of associated services (water, sewer, electrical, etc.). 

#### Key Dates:
- **Publication Date:** April 10, 2024
- **Tender Closing Date:** May 28, 2024, 2:00 PM EDT (Eastern Daylight Time)
- **Expected Contract Start Date:** June 06, 2024
- **Expected Contract End Date:** June 05, 2026

#### Eligibility Criteria:
This procurement is subject to the Directive on Government Contracts, Including Real Property Leases, in the Nunavut Settlement Area (the Nunavut Directive) and is limited to firms registered on the Inuit Firm Registry (IFR).

#### Evaluation Criteria:
The selection of the successful contractor will be based on a competitive evaluation process, focusing on the combined rating of technical merit and price.

#### Contact Information:
For questions or clarifications, please contact:
Eric Kwan (SPAC/PSPC)
Tender: WS4499910042
Email: [eric.kwan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:eric.kwan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
Phone: ***Not Provided***
Fax: ***Not Provided***
